Kentwood.RiverTown Crossings: RiverTown Crossings is a two-story enclosed super-regional shopping mall in Grandville, Michigan. Opened in 1999, the mall was developed by General Growth Properties of Chicago, Illinois. It has seven anchors: Sears, Macy's, Kohl's, Younkers, JCPenney, Dick's Sporting Goods and Celebration Cinema.
